dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text:
Welcome to andOTP, this wizard will guide you through the initial setup. Please pay attention and read carefully otherwise you could lose data! 

Don't worry, you can still change any of the options later in the Settings.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text:
Welcome to andOTP, this wizard will guide you through the initial setup. Please pay attention and read carefully otherwise you could lose data! 

Don't worry, you can still change any of the options later in the Settings.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text:
Welcome to andOTP, this wizard will guide you through the initial setup. Please pay attention and read carefully otherwise you could lose data! 

Don't worry, you can still change any of the options later in the Settings.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: To ensure the security of your accounts andOTP only stores them in encrypted data files. Here you can choose which method of encryption will be used.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: This method will encrypt your data with a key generated from a password or PIN. The main advantage here is that this will work with external backup solutions (like Titanium) and is much less failure-prone than the KeyStore. However, you will have to enter your credentials every time you start andOTP.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Here you can setup an authentication to lock andOTP. Since you have chosen Password / PIN as encryption method you need to set either a password or a PIN to proceed.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Here you can setup an authentication to lock andOTP. Since you have chosen Password / PIN as encryption method you need to set either a password or a PIN to proceed.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Here you can setup an authentication to lock andOTP. Since you have chosen Password / PIN as encryption method you need to set either a password or a PIN to proceed.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Here you can setup an authentication to lock andOTP. Since you have chosen Password / PIN as encryption method you need to set either a password or a PIN to proceed.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Here you can setup an authentication to lock andOTP. Since you have chosen Password / PIN as encryption method you need to set either a password or a PIN to proceed.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Your settings have been saved, you are all set to use andOTP now!

dynGuiComponent.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponent.text:
This will be the last version of andOTP to support Android versions below 5.1 (Lollipop). The increased effort required to maintain a separate storage implementation just for those older versions as well as their low market shares make a continued support infeasible for our small team.

This message will not be shown again.
